item.title: VMware vCloud Hybrid Service
item.description: Just as I was thinking about starting this blog site, along came the public release of VMware’s entry in to the cloud space, vCloud Hybrid Service. I think that VMware first started telling me that I was on a “Journey to the Cloud” at VMworldÂ way back in 2008. I guess I have been meandering a bit since then as I am not sure that I have gone too far on that journey.
